test-method.name: Check item total cost and tax

exception.message: Given I am on the home page.................................................passed And I login in with the following details...................................passed And I add the following items to the basket.................................passed And I should see 4 items added to the shopping cart........................passed And I click on the shopping cart............................................passed And I verify that the QTY count for each item should be 1...................passed And I remove the following item:............................................passed And I should see 3 items added to the shopping cart........................failed And I click on the CHECKOUT button..........................................skipped And I type "FirstName" for First Name.......................................skipped And I type "LastName" for Last Name.........................................skipped And I type "EC1A 9JU" for ZIP/Postal Code...................................skipped When I click on the CONTINUE button.........................................skipped Then Item total will be equal to the total of items on the list.............skipped And a Tax rate of 8 % is applied to the total...............................skipped
exception.full-stacktrace: java.lang.AssertionError: Cart item count mismatch expected [3] but found [4] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:97) at org.testng.Assert.assertEqualsImpl(Assert.java:136) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:118) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:839) at mission.StepDefinition.iShouldSeeItemsInCart(StepDefinition.java:61) at ✽.And I should see 3 items added to the shopping cart(src/test/java/UI-Test.feature:22)
